problem.markdown:
>>For a given load, P, if the cross-sectional area, A, of a column is doubled, what will happen to the compressive stress in the column?<< ( ) It will also double (x) It will decrease by a factor of 2 ( ) It will increase by a factor of 4 ( ) It will decrease by a factor of 4
[explanation] Explanation: Compressive stress is inversely proportional to the cross-sectional area. As the area increases, the stress decreases. [explanation]
